title: Care of the patient with diabetes mellitus (complicated)

description: Shows the nurses' role in the diagnosis and treatment of coma and insulin shock, and the role of the nurse, doctor, dietitian, and psychiatrist in assisting the patient to develop a healthy mental attitude towards his condition.
